Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Sprint 1 - Authentication, Multi-Org & CI/CD

## Authentication & Multi-Organization
- Add JWT authentication with refresh token rotation
- Add SSO support via Passport.js \(Google, GitHub, OIDC, SAML\)
- Add identity providers and user identities tables
- Add organization management with RBAC \(owner, admin, member, viewer\)
- Add invitation system for organization membership
- Add password reset flow with secure tokens

## Database & Row-Level Security
- Add PostgreSQL RLS policies for multi-tenant data isolation
- Add RLS context middleware for automatic session variable setting
- Add users, organizations, org_members schema
- Add audit_logs table for compliance tracking
- Add Drizzle ORM relations for relational queries

## CI/CD & Deployment
- Replace single ci.yml with separate pr.yml and deploy.yml workflows
- Add security scanning \(npm audit, Trivy, TruffleHog, CodeQL\)
- Add migration safety workflow to block destructive operations
- Add Slack notification workflow
- Add CODEOWNERS for mandatory reviews
- Add multi-stage Dockerfile for API
- Add environment configs \(.env.test, .env.production.example\)

## Documentation
- Add implementation architecture documentation
- Add Phase 1: Auth & Multi-Org guide with diagrams
- Add Phase 2: Database & RLS guide with diagrams
- Add Phase 3: CI/CD & Deployment guide with diagrams

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
